name: Courier Cap
description: Protects from the sun, gives a stylish appearance, keeps you from sunstroke in the hot season. Quality production, size adjustment, affordable price. Better with it than without it.

name: Unknown Rapper Cap
description: Rumor has it, he lived in a distant hip-hop country and has been freestyling since he was a kid. After years of wandering, his cap has soaked up the smell of the streets and seen a lot of flashy battles. The straight visor and red cross adds style and shows who grew up on the streets.

name: Butcher's Cap
description: BBQ? The meat specialties of the Texas butchers were made in this particular hood which was passed from father to son by inheritance. The soot and smoke gave the hood an incredible, knock-your-socks-off smell! Vegetarians are furious!

name: Hat of a French Lord
description: Stylish accessory from France, belonging to one of the Lords of the Renaissance. We had it restored, replaced the feather, but kept the spirit of style and fashion that captivate the spirit and impress the high society.

name: Magical Pilgrim's Hat
description: Magic permeate this delightful headpiece, rumor has it that leaving the hat alone will start rabbits crawling out of it. The wearer is guarded by the spirit of the pilgrim and helps him overcome almost any obstacle in his path. It's just magic!

name: Robin Hood's Hat
description: Dozens of daring robberies of wealthy merchants have seen this gimmick that helps with camouflage in the wilds and adds brutal charm to its wearer. The gold-plated buckle lets you adjust the size and adds a special shine. Are you ready for adventure with it?

name: Legendary Sheriff's Hat
description: Over 1000 criminals have been caught and sentenced by the legendary sheriff, and criminals are afraid to say his name out loud. This magnificent hat has imbibed the spirit of justice and law and order. Let's bring order in the wild west style, shall we?

name: Crown of the Seven Kingdoms
description: Legendary work of the finest smiths of the old world, inlaid with rubies, amethysts and emeralds to convey the majesty and power of the wearer. Shine with golden brilliance dazzling your enemies! Be the king - you are worthy of it!

name: Lightning
description: The water elemental magicians of Neptuanu used the hat to control the gusts of water.

name: Moonfall
description: Legends say that these hats were given by the Moonfall elves for practicing light.

name: Sandstorm
description: A wide-brimmed hat the color of desert sand with moving images of sand dunes. Created by the nomads of Sarnak for protection from desert sandstorms.

name: Miracolik
description: A  hat with enticing shadows and a moonstone on the torso. The wearer of this hat could summon shadow creatures from the Mrakoles to aid in jousting.

name: Radugastre
description: A multicolored hat with mirrored inserts that shimmered with rainbows. The master glassblowers of the Rainbow Tree created them to explore the spectrum of light.

name: Royal jester's hat
description: According to the legend, when the king executed the jester, the hat remained on the poor man's head.

name: Forest Mouth
description: The guardians of the Woodland wore these hats for invisibility in the forests and to control the trees.

name: Flowerbunny
description: A testament of the sage Knigvir, giving the ability to read the minds of animals and plants.

name: Frizcas
description: A soft velvet hat with an evil eye of omnipotence. A gift from the forest dwelling fairies, balancing the wearer's energy and giving them a sound sleep.

name: Greenguard
description: The green leprechaun's hat promises you treasure, but I'm afraid that's not the only thing you'll get.

name: Star Leaf
description: Made of golden leaves with spiked edges, glittering at every angle. Worn only by the chiefs of the Lucini tribe living under the constellation of Arxa.

name: Viking crown
description: Legend has it there were two twin brothers. Strong and powerful, they were able to conquer 1,000 seas together. But one became a Pirate and the other a Viking. You can only tell them apart when they put on their crowns.

name: Pirate crown
description: Legend has it there were two twin brothers. Strong and powerful, they were able to conquer 1,000 seas together. But one became a Pirate and the other a Viking. You can only tell them apart when they put on their crowns.

name: Electrozar
description: An invention by the dwarves of Electrorogorod to protect against and control  lightning.

name: Whisperer
description: A hat with fine strings that produce melodies with any movement. Used by minstrels and bards to create music from ambient sounds.

name: Svetowea
description: A hat with light emanating from its brim, with a transparent torso filled with glowing lights. Created by ancient alchemists in the kingdom of Lumina for protection against creatures of the night.

name: Robber hat
description: The king of the forest robbers once wore this hat . It's imbued with an adventurous spirit and incredible luck.

name: Grimsword
description: Blade-like edges and shimmering glitter in the margins. Worn by the Knights of Grimsward to intimidate opponents and protect them from enemies.

name: Astronark
description: A hat of woven starry matter, glittering and shimmering with the colors of the cosmos. Used by the magicians of astrology to control the course of the stars.

name: Sandy
description: A hat from the eastern edges carries the mystery of a forgotten desert.

name: Tenebris
description: Used by shamans to communicate with the spirits of Tenebris, the realm of night.

name: Temporary
description: Invented by the Chrononauts to control the passage of time and open time portals.

name: Firebringer
description: A hat made of fireproof material, with a torso that radiates heat. The blacksmiths of Firemerge wore these hats to control the flames in their forges.

name: Windrun
description: A light as a feather hat with a brim decorated with ancient runic insignia. Worn by the people of Nordran to control the wind and air currents.

name: Snowmageddon
description: A hat covered in hoarfrost, with snowflakes gently settling on the brim and torso. The northern warriors of Ledostan wore them to control snow and ice.
